rows.label: tlk41700321_05_msg0001
rows.name:
After talking to the town elders,
we've decided to erect a memorial
statue for the people of Cordell.

rows.label: tlk41700321_05_msg0002
rows.name:
To honor those who lost their lives in
the sudden attack, and to grant 'em
happiness in the next life.

rows.label: tlk41700321_05_msg0003
rows.name:
The bandits have already been
shipped back to Superbia and
locked up, I hear.

rows.label: tlk41700321_05_msg0004
rows.name:
On that note, we've also been
discussing the matter of enforcing
security measures on Gula.

rows.label: tlk41700321_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Though my wish would be that no
Driver of ill intent ever sets foot here
again...
